books.title: Wired Love
books.author: Ella Cheever Thayer
books.summary: A romance begins over the wire between two telegraph operators.

books.title: Allan Quatermain
books.author: H. Rider Haggard
books.summary: Adventurer Allan Quatermain sets out on a mission to Africa to locate a mysterious tribe of white-skinned people.

books.title: Personal Memoirs of Ulysses S. Grant
books.author: Ulysses S. Grant
books.summary: One of the greatest generals of the United States tells the story of his life and details his key role in winning the Civil War.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: Five Children and It
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Five children encounter an ancient magical creature who grants them wishes—all of which go comically wrong.

books.title: Jurgen
books.author: James Branch Cabell
books.summary: Jurgen, a pawnbroker and “monstrous clever fellow,” is sent on a witty and parodic magical journey in search of true love.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Ben Jonson
books.summary: A rollicking Elizabethan comedy in which two con men and their female compatriot gull a series of unfortunate victims out of their money.

books.title: The Gods of Mars
books.author: Edgar Rice Burroughs
books.summary: John Carter returns to Mars to try and determine the fate of his lost love Dejah Thoris.

books.title: Hindu Tales from the Sanskrit
books.author: S. M. Mitra
books.summary: Short stories and fables from the Sanskrit tradition.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: H. P. Lovecraft
books.summary: The complete U.S. public domain short fiction of horror legend H. P. Lovecraft.

books.title: My Disillusionment in Russia
books.author: Emma Goldman
books.summary: Emma Goldman recounts her experiences living in the early Soviet Union.

books.title: The Lodger
books.author: Marie Belloc Lowndes
books.summary: A maid and butler take in a mysterious, eccentric gentleman lodger around the time of the Jack the Ripper murders.

books.title: Practical Mysticism
books.author: Evelyn Underhill
books.summary: Evelyn Underhill makes the case that mysticism is accessible and beneficial to everyone.

books.title: What Is Property?
books.author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon
books.summary: Proudhon outlines the anarchist economic theory of mutualism.

books.title: The Faerie Queene
books.author: Edmund Spenser
books.summary: Six knights embodying Christian virtues embark on allegorical quests.

books.title: Candide
books.author: Voltaire
books.summary: A witty satire that tells of the young Candide’s attempts to stay optimistic through a series of incredible hardships.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Fritz Leiber
books.summary: A collection of Fritz Leiber short stories and novellas ordered by date of publication.

books.title: Short Fiction
books.author: Voltairine de Cleyre
books.summary: A collection of all of the short stories written by Voltairine de Cleyre.

books.title: The Pilgrim’s Progress
books.author: John Bunyan
books.summary: An allegorical story of a pilgrim in search of redemption, followed later by his wife and children, passing through great trials before reaching the Celestial City.

books.title: Journals
books.author: Alexander Mackenzie
books.summary: Explorer Alexander Mackenzie details his journeys to both the Arctic and Pacific Oceans in his personal journals.
